_header: Wheat is both seemly and soot
_description: In praise of Wheat — six quatrains with refrain, ‘So blyssid be the qwete flour’ and burden: ‘Of alle the spyces þat I knowe / Blyssid be the qwete flour’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Qwete is bothe semely & soteOf alle spyces þat is
                    bote…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…He let vs neuer for hunger deyeSo blyssid be the qwete
                    flour
